title: Ashes
description: --INCOMPLETED SHORT STORY--The story of misfit eighteen-year-old Ember Whiteâ€”a girl who gained the power over the mind after discovering a subconscious dimension known as the Otherworld. Repressed by a heavily alcoholic and abusive father, tormented by her peers at school, and constantly having to figure out for herself who to trust and who not to trust, we see how Ember became the Witch of the Otherworld and lost the boy of her dreams.
author: Stacey T. Hunt
